/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, their leaves rustling in the breeze, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, creating a serene backdrop for the bustling city below. The image is captured in 360 degrees, providing a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. This image truly captures the essence of Beijing, a city where tradition and modernity coexist harmoniously.
